thread.title: Trump mum on Iran nuclear decision

title: Trump mum on Iran nuclear decision
text:
Trump mum on Iran nuclear decision 3:39pm EDT - 01:31
President Donald Trump on Monday declined to say whether the United States would pull out of the Iran nuclear deal before a May 12 decision deadline, but declared that Iran was ''not sitting back idly. They're setting off missiles, which they say are for television purposes. I don't think so.'' Rough Cut Donald Trump on Monday declined to say whether the United States would pull out of the Iran nuclear deal before a May 12 decision deadline, but declared that Iran was "not sitting back idly. They're setting off missiles, which they say are for television purposes. I don't think so." Rough Cut //reut.rs/2KqpS4s
